name: Soggy Horror
description:
Take a step into a haunted manor in search of a mystery, only to get more then you bargain for. Turns out the cult that resides here wants nothing more then your padded servitude and humiliation for their own depraved ends. Can you make it to the bottom of this diaper pail of a situation? Can you defeat the kinky cult? Or will you succumb to the curse and be forced to stay forever? Soggy Horror is a 3 "horror" game that doesn't take itself too seriously. Defeat puzzles, avoid the enemies, and try not to get captured by the cultists. Lights help cultists see you: Stay hidden to avoid becoming their next padded victim... 

Or don't. We understand.

---

Default Controls (Can be redefined at any time)

WASD for movement 

Space for Jump 

C to go into a crawl position.

Tab to bring up your inventory.

1-4 brings out the assigned equipment item to that slot.

Z and X for lean left and right.

---

You will need 7zip to extract the .7z file https://www.7-zip.org
